name: Metalo International Pte Ltd
description: Metalo International has 10 years of experience in the electronic waste industry in Singapore. They manage collection and trading of ferrous scrap metals, electrical components, electronics and other precious metals scrap. Besides, they also provide services to dismantle and dispose computer & other IT hardware and accessories (laptops, printers, monitors, used networking equipments, servers, etc.) They have their own facilities to handle electronic waste or export to Thailand and Japan for refinery in an ethical way.
